RTCDataChannelMessage_event.summary: The WebRTC message event is sent to the event handler on an object when a message has been received from the remote peer.

blockquote.para: Note: The message event uses as its event object type the interface defined by the HTML specification.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.

-WebRTC API
-A simple RTCDataChannel example
-Related events: , , and
